newsitem.title: USA: Spectratek unit in preliminary $500,000/month deal.
newsitem.headline: Spectratek unit in preliminary $500,000/month deal.

text.p: Spectratek Inc said Wednesday its Teltran International unit reached a preliminary agreement to provide project management, consulting and other services to a major telecommunications company, bringing in about $500,000 a month in extra revenue for the next two years.
The preliminary agreement also provides additional renewal options, said Spectratek, which declined to comment further.
The company said it will provide more information when it reaches a formal agreement with the unnamed telecommunications company.
